name: aargh
others_no_arg: $n throws back $s head and howls in profound frustration!
actor_found_target: You scream your frustration and grab for $S throat with both hands!

target_found: $n grabs for your throat with two hands, howling in frustration!

others_auto: $n screams in frustration at $e's own stupidity.
